description: Greek souvlaki skewers are quick and delicious with a lemony herb marinade.
name: Pork Souvlaki Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g pork shoulder, trimmed of fat, cut into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the oil, 2 tablespoons of lemon juice, oregano, cumin, paprika and 1 garlic clove together in a shallow dish and add the pork. Toss to coat, cover and leave to marinate for 1 hour.
Whisk the yoghurt, garlic clove and a tablespoon of lemon juice together to make a dip.
Thread the pork on to soaked wooden or metal skewers and cook under the grill or on the BBQ for 10-12 minutes, until cooked through. Serve with the dip.
